text: Aabharanacharthu is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by IV Sasi, starring Murali and Krishna Kumar in the lead role.http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/abharana-charthu.html ==Cast== * Krishna Kumar * Murali * Suchithra Murali * Chandni Shaju * Chithra * Jagadish * Kanakalatha * Narendra Prasad * Oduvil Unnikrishnan * Dhanya Menon * Praseetha * Ramadevi * Sarath Das * Thrissur Elsy * VK Sreeraman ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by I. V. Sasi
title: Aabharanacharthu
